text: Goddess of Liberty is a sculpture by Elijah E. Myers, installed atop the Texas State Capitol dome, in Austin, Texas, United States. The original statue was erected in February 1888. It was replaced by another replica on June 14, 1986, and the original was restored and relocated to the Bullock Texas State History Museum. ==See also== * Miss Freedom, a similar statue atop the Georgia State Capitol * Statue of Freedom, a similar statue atop the United States Capitol * List of public art in Austin, Texas ==References== ==External links== * Category:Outdoor sculptures in Austin, Texas Category:Sculptures of women in Texas Category:Statues in Austin, Texas
title: Goddess of Liberty (Texas State Capitol)
